title: ISic003555. A late Christian dedication?
body:
1Α
2Ἰησοῦς Χριστὸς θεοῦ
3υἱὸς Σωτὴρ καὶ
4σταυρωθε[ίς]
5 Ω

1Α
2ΙΗΣΟΥΣΧΡΙΣΤΟΣΘΕΟΥ
3ΥΙΟΣΣΩΤΗΡΚΑΙ
4ΣΤΑΥΡΩΘΕ[..]
5Ω

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Filippi and SEG, following Filippi's transcription of the manuscript tradition

translation

commentary

In contrast to the other texts reported in the 18th-century Trapani manuscript tradition, this text is quite possibly not a forgery; it is however most likely to be post-antique, as suggested by Korhonen (di epoca postmedievale). It was omitted by Kaibel, presumably on these grounds.

bibliography

  • 52.0900 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Filippi 2002 74-75 no. 6/8 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001991
  • Filippi 2005 70 no. 6/8 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002296
  • Korhonen 2017 199 n. 15 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001484
